name: Cowell
stereotype: Friendly, open-minded, social, and a bit quirky. Appreciates tradition, community, and the arts.
housing_quality: Classic dorms with beautiful views of the bay; older but well-maintained.

name: Stevenson
stereotype: Thoughtful, academically driven, and community-oriented. Known for its strong core course and social sciences focus.
housing_quality: Traditional dorms, close-knit community, central location.

name: Crown
stereotype: Tech-savvy, ambitious, collaborative, and STEM-focused. Many gamers and coders.
housing_quality: Suite-style housing, some of the best views on campus, close to science buildings.

name: Merrill
stereotype: Passionate about social justice, diversity, and global issues. Activist and inclusive community.
housing_quality: Suite-style housing, unique architecture, close to the woods.

name: Porter
stereotype: Creative, artistic, free-spirited, and expressive. Lots of musicians, artists, and performers.
housing_quality: Spacious dorms and apartments, art studios, and a vibrant quad.

name: Kresge
stereotype: Independent, alternative, quirky, and community-minded. Progressive and experimental.
housing_quality: Recently renovated, modern apartments and townhouses, unique layout.

name: Oakes
stereotype: Welcoming, supportive, and passionate about diversity, social justice, and community service.
housing_quality: Apartments and dorms with a strong community feel, beautiful forest surroundings.

name: Rachel Carson
stereotype: Outdoorsy, eco-conscious, and interested in science and policy. Focused on environmentalism and sustainability.
housing_quality: Modern, sustainable dorms and apartments, close to science hill.

name: College Nine
stereotype: Globally minded, academically focused, and interested in international issues. Diverse and nerdy.
housing_quality: Newest dorms and apartments, modern amenities, international theme.

name: John R. Lewis (College Ten)
stereotype: Progressive, activist, passionate about leadership, equity, and social change.
housing_quality: Newest and most modern housing on campus, large apartments, and community spaces.
